AboutSection.title: What is Demosmap?
AboutSection.description: Demosmap is a software platform that enables the creation of customized questionnaires with the ability to visualize opinions in a geolocated format and subsequently send mass communications via WhatsApp, segmented according to each subset of responses.

Diagram.title: How it Works
Diagram.step1: The client wants to know public opinion on a specific issue.
Diagram.step3: Using a personalized link, they send it to their target audiences.
Diagram.step5: The client can analyze the results in real time.
Diagram.step6: They generate segmented WhatsApp campaigns targeted to each audience of interest.

service1.title: Geolocate the results through heat maps
service1.description: Visualize the results clearly and accurately using geolocated heat maps that allow you to analyze data distribution.

service2.title: Scientifically guaranteed representativeness
service2.description: Demosmap ensures the representativeness and reliability of the results by applying rigorous statistical criteria that guarantee the survey is both representative and trustworthy.

service3.title: Use of WhatsApp for micro-segmented messaging
service3.description: Connect directly with your audience. We give you the ability to segment your target audience for subsequent communication via WhatsApp.
